description:
Satine Phoenix experiences the harsh reality of a Device Bondage shoot.
Gagged tight and locked in a steel cage on her hands and knees...
Standing up, with her body woven through iron bars and her neck clamped in place with an iron collar...
On the floor wrapped up painfully tight, bones and joints mashed against each other, making even the smallest movement an agonizing experience...
She takes it all for you. She hopes her suffering will bring you pleasure.
title: Permutations
